title: Electric potential zero at center of triangle

content.description: The following are configurations of electric charges located at the vertices of an equilateral triangle. Point P is in the plane of the triangle and equidistant from the charges.
content.question: In which configuration is the electric field at P pointed directly toward one of the charges?

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
